PlantForm: Upright thicket-forming shrub or small tree.
Stem: Slender, drooping and tend to zig-zag. With thorns 5-20 mm long.
Leaves: Flat green stalk up to 30 cm long with small green leaflets along both sides.
Flowers: Bright yellow, fragrant 1-2 cm wide, in loose bundles on long stalks near branch ends.
FruitSeeds: Pencil-like pods 5-10 cm long with constrictions between seeds.
DistinguishingFeatures: Flattened leaf stalk with leaflets is distinctive.
Impacts: Forms dense thickets making land inacessible and sheltering pest animals. Causes erosion and can make water inaccessible.
